SEARCH
Module net.tangly.fsm
Package net.tangly.fsm

Interface Transition<O,S extends Enum<S>,E extends Enum<E>>

Type Parameters:
O - the class of the instance owning the finite state machine instance
S - the state enumeration type uniquely identifying a state in the state machine
E - the event enumeration type uniquely identifying the event sent to the state machine
public interface Transition<O,S extends Enum<S>,E extends Enum<E>>
The transition defines a link between two finite machine states. The class provides an immutable interface on the instances.

    • evaluate

      boolean evaluate(O context, Event<E> event)
      Evaluate the event and guard of the transition.
      Parameters:
      context - instance owning the finite state machine
      event - event triggering the transition
      Returns:
      true if the transition can be fired otherwise false

    • execute

      boolean execute(O context, Event<E> event)
      Execute the action associated with the transition if defined. The action is only executed if the event and guard evaluate to true evaluate(Object, Event).
      Parameters:
      context - instance owning the finite state machine
      event - the event triggering the execution of the action
      Returns:
      true if the transition was fired otherwise false
